Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Iberville, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of five (5) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $3,017,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating the public drainage works throughout the Parish?
